chat.docs: Create a chat while specifying the default retrieval parameters used by the prompt.

request.query: How can I use the Vectara platform?

stream_response.docs: Indicates whether the response should be streamed or not.

chat_stream.docs: Create a chat while specifying the default retrieval parameters used by the prompt.

request.query: How can I use the Vectara platform?

stream.chunk: Hello, how can I help you today?

stream_response.docs: Indicates whether the response should be streamed or not.

ChatFullResponse.docs: Full response to a chat question when the result is not streamed.

answer.docs: The message from the chat model for the chat message.

chat_id.docs: If the chat response was stored, the ID of the chat.

turn_id.docs: If the chat response was stored, the ID of the turn.

ChatStreamedResponse.docs: An individual event when the response is streamed.

__package__.yml.rawContents:
service:
  auth: false
  base-path: ''
  endpoints:
    chat_stream:
      path: /v2/chats
      method: POST
      auth: false
      docs: >-
        Create a chat while specifying the default retrieval parameters used by
        the prompt.
      source:
        openapi: ../openapi.yml
      display-name: Start a chat
      request:
        name: ChatStreamRequest
        body:
          properties:
            query:
              type: string
              docs: The chat message or question.
            stream_response:
              type: literal<true>
              docs: Indicates whether the response should be streamed or not.
        content-type: application/json
      response-stream:
        docs: ''
        type: ChatStreamedResponse
        format: json
      examples:
        - request:
            query: How can I use the Vectara platform?
            stream_response: true
          response:
            stream:
              - chunk: Hello, how can I help you today?
    chat:
      path: /v2/chats
      method: POST
      auth: false
      docs: >-
        Create a chat while specifying the default retrieval parameters used by
        the prompt.
      source:
        openapi: ../openapi.yml
      display-name: Start a chat
      request:
        name: ChatRequest
        body:
          properties:
            query:
              type: string
              docs: The chat message or question.
            stream_response:
              type: literal<false>
              docs: Indicates whether the response should be streamed or not.
        content-type: application/json
      response:
        docs: ''
        type: ChatFullResponse
        status-code: 200
      examples:
        - request:
            query: How can I use the Vectara platform?
            stream_response: false
          response:
            body:
              chat_id: chat_id
              turn_id: turn_id
              answer: answer
  source:
    openapi: ../openapi.yml
types:
  ChatFullResponse:
    docs: Full response to a chat question when the result is not streamed.
    properties:
      chat_id:
        type: optional<string>
        docs: If the chat response was stored, the ID of the chat.
      turn_id:
        type: optional<string>
        docs: If the chat response was stored, the ID of the turn.
      answer:
        type: optional<string>
        docs: The message from the chat model for the chat message.
    source:
      openapi: ../openapi.yml
  ChatStreamedResponse:
    docs: An individual event when the response is streamed.
    properties:
      chunk:
        type: optional<string>
        docs: The chunk of the response.
    source:
      openapi: ../openapi.yml

Request-Timeout.docs: The API will make a best effort to complete the request in the specified seconds or time out.
Request-Timeout.name: requestTimeout

Request-Timeout-Millis.docs: The API will make a best effort to complete the request in the specified milliseconds or time out.
Request-Timeout-Millis.name: requestTimeoutMillis

rootApiFile.rawContents:
name: api
error-discrimination:
  strategy: status-code
display-name: Vectara REST API v2
environments:
  Default: https://api.streamingtest.io
default-environment: Default
headers:
  Request-Timeout:
    type: optional<integer>
    name: requestTimeout
    docs: >-
      The API will make a best effort to complete the request in the specified
      seconds or time out.
  Request-Timeout-Millis:
    type: optional<integer>
    name: requestTimeoutMillis
    docs: >-
      The API will make a best effort to complete the request in the specified
      milliseconds or time out.
